sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState("") const [park, setPark] = useState("Select an option") const [age, setAge] = useState("") const [like, setLike] = useState("") const [username, setUsername] = useState("") const [nameError, setnameError] = useState("") const [emailError, setemailError] = useState("") const [ageError, setAgeError] = useState("") const [parkError, setparkError] = useState("") const [emptyError,setEmptyerror] = useState("") const resetErrorDefault =()=>{ setnameError("") setAgeError("") setlikeError("") setemailError("") setparkError("") setEmptyerror("") } const validate =()=>{ if( name === "" || email === "" || park === "" || age==="" ){ setEmptyerror("All fields are mondatory") setUsername("") return false } if(!name.match(/^[A-Za-z0-9- ]+$/)){ setnameError("Name is not Alphanumertic") setUsername("") return false } if (!email.includes("@")){ setemailError("Email must contain @") setUsername("") return false; } if(!park.match(/Website|Hulu|Youtube|TV|other/i)){ setparkError("Please identify as male,female or other") setUsername("") return false } if(!age.match(/^[0-9]+$/)){ setAgeError("Age must contain only numbers") setUsername("") return false; } if(!like.match(/I love it!|I like it|It's ok|Not really/i)){ setlikeError("Please identify as male,female or other") setUsername("") return false } } const handleSubmit =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() resetErrorDefault() const isValid = validate() if (isValid){ setName("") setEmail("") setPark("") setLike("") setAge("") resetErrorDefault() } setUsername(email.substr(0,email.indexOf("@"))) } return (
{/*

You have to fill this form first

<> Enter your Name {setName(e.target.value)}}/>
{nameError} <> Enter your Email {setEmail(e.target.value)}}/>
{emailError}
<> Select Gender
{genderError} <> Enter Your phone no. {setPhonenumber(e.target.value)}}/>
{phoneNumberError} <> Enter Password {setPassword(e.target.value)}}/>
{passwordError} {emptyError}

{username ? "Hello " + username : "adfar"}

*/}

WELLCOME TO SOUTH PARK!

Tell us about your experience with South Park

{setName(e.target.value)}} /> {nameError}
{setEmail(e.target.value)}}/> {emailError}
{setAge(e.target.value)}}/> {ageError}
{parkError}
I love it!

I like it

It's ok

Not really

Alone

Friends

Family

Partner

Other



{emptyError}

your username

{username ? "Hello " + username : ""}
); } export default App;
